sentences.sContent: Then the men of David sware unto him, saying, Thou shalt go no more out with us to battle, that thou quench not the light of Israel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then the men of David sware unto him, saying, Thou shalt go no more out with us to battle, that thou quench not the light of Israel.
sentences.sCn: 当日，跟随大卫的人向大卫起誓说，以后你不可再与我们一同出战，恐怕熄灭以色列的灯。

synos.tran: 熄灭，[机]淬火；解渴；结束；冷浸

remMethod.val: quen(看做queen， 女王) + ch → 扑灭女王的嚣张气焰 → 扑灭， 熄灭

words.tran: 难熄灭的；难压制的；难镇静的
[机] 淬火；抑制；[物] 猝熄
